description.p: A Product_category is a classification for a product identified by the category name. A Product_category may be assigned directly to a product as the specific product type. Product_category instances may be structured into classification hierarchies of categories and subcategories.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: optional description of the category name

inverse.name: owner
inverse.description: the optional organization or person in organization that defines or owns the category.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The owner role shall be 'category owner'.

description.p: A Product_category_hierarchy object supports structured hierarchies of categories and subcategories.

explicit.name: super_category
explicit.description: the parent Product_category in the classification hierarchy

explicit.name: sub_category
explicit.description: the child Product_category in the classification hierarchy
